title: Design of 2D/2D ZnIn2S4/MgAl-LDH core-shell nanostructures toward enhanced photodegradation of organic dyes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00340C, Paper
Qiang Gao, Lingchun Ye, wei liu, junxi li, Yuchen Cui, Naicai Xu, Mingjin Zhang
The rational design of semiconductor photocatalysts with multi-dimensional nanostructures is an effective way to solve the problem of water environmental pollution. Herein, a series of ZnIn2S4/MgAl-LDH (ZIS/LDH) composites with core-shell...
